revisions.rev:
This is a list of '''seasons played by [[Rangers F.C.|Rangers Football Club]]''' in Scottish and European [[football (soccer)|football]], from 1890 to the present day. It details the club's achievements in major competitions, and the top scorers for each season. ==Overview== Although Rangers had been playing in the [[Scottish Cup]] since season 1874–75, being runners-up twice, they did not compete in an official league until 1890–91. In their very first season the club played eighteen championship matches, also a play-off which they drew and so shared the first ever league title with [[Dumbarton F.C.|Dumbarton]]. The [[Scottish League Cup]] did not begin until season 1946–47, Rangers won the inaugural competition by defeating [[Aberdeen F.C.|Aberdeen]] 4–0 in the final. The 1956–57 season saw the club enter the European arena. During all seasons listed below, the club has competed at the highest level of the [[Scottish football league system]]. ==Seasons== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- ! rowspan=2|Season ! colspan=9|League ! rowspan=2|[[Scottish Cup|Scottish
Cup]] ! rowspan=2|[[Scottish League Cup|League
